<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">
    <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <code_url/>
        <code_url_2/>
        <details/>
        <example_steps/>
        <example_url/>
        <module/>
        <number>SNSCRIPT0001128</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>// This makes a duplicate article in the 'draft' state

var newRevision = current;
newRevision.workflow_state = 'draft';
newRevision.u_summary_of_revisions = '';
newRevision.published = '';
newRevision.u_parent = current.sys_id;
newRevision.u_version ++;
newRevision.insert();


//gs.addInfoMessage("Revision generated");

action.setRedirectURL(newRevision);
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type>UI Action</script_type>
        <short_description>Generating a new Version of a KB Article</short_description>
        <state>Submitted</state>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>

        <tested_on_helsinki/>
    </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting>
</record_update>
